effect.scarlet_violet: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.the_teal_mask: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.the_indigo_disk: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: If the user is knocked out after using this move, the Pokémon that knocked it out will also faint. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
